column1: Uchi////I went there tonight with my friend and was served by Patrick and I think a Pam or Kim... 45 minute wait as a walk-in so it wasn't a big deal whatsoever. Just had coffee next door and boom
column2: seated at the sushi bar which was a cool experience. The restaurant was slammed and they gave complimentary artichoke hearts which was very nice of them. Golden Tile was good
column3: torched Wagyu was delicious and succulent
column5: and wine selection was great. Now I see all the hype of this Houston/Montrose place. Best sushi place that's not on the West Coast in my honest opinion.
